title: iPhone 16 price drops by 20%, iPhone 15 by 18.5% during Flipkart, Amazon Republic Day sale events - The Financial Express
summary:
iPhone prices have dropped with popular ecommerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon lining up to offer Apple’s latest at all-time-low prices.

Publication Date: January 14, 2025

Source: Financial Express

iPhone prices have dropped with popular ecommerce platforms like Flipkart and Amazon offering significant discounts during their Republic Day sales. The iPhone 16 is now available with a nearly 20% discount, while the iPhone 15 sees an 18.5% reduction, making this a prime time for potential buyers.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone 16's price reduced from Rs 79,900 to Rs 63,999 on Flipkart.
  • The iPhone 15 is priced at Rs 56,999 during the Amazon sale.
  • Additional discounts available through bank offers can lower the prices further.
  • Both sales run from January 14 to January 19, 2025.
newTitle: iPhone 16 and 15 Price Cuts During Republic Day Sale on Flipkart and Amazon

title: Vivo T3 Ultra, T3 Pro Prices Drop: Check Revised Rate, Features, and More - HerZindagi English
summary:
Vivo T3 Ultra, T3 Pro Prices Drop: Check Revised Rate, Features, and More

Publication Date: N/A Source: Herzindagi

Vivo has announced a ₹2,000 price cut for its popular T-series smartphones in India, making the T3 Ultra and T3 Pro more affordable for customers.

  • The Vivo T3 Pro prices start at ₹22,999 for 8GB RAM/128GB storage and ₹24,999 for 8GB RAM/256GB storage.
  • The Vivo T3 Ultra is priced at ₹31,999 for 8GB RAM/256GB storage and ₹33,999 for 12GB RAM/256GB storage.
  • The smartphones are available for purchase at the Vivo India e-store, Flipkart, and authorized retailers.
  • The T3 Ultra features a MediaTek Dimensity 9200+ processor and a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, while the T3 Pro has a Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset and a 6.77-inch AMOLED screen.
  • Both phones come with advanced camera systems, offering high-quality photography options.
“With the recent price reduction, the T3 Ultra and T3 Pro are now even more competitive in the mid-range smartphone market.”

These devices offer premium features at a more affordable price, appealing to a wider range of customers.
newTitle: Vivo T3 Ultra and T3 Pro Get Price Cuts in India

title: WhatsApp update brings double tap reactions, selfie stickers, and shareable packs - The Indian Express
summary:
WhatsApp Update Introduces Double Tap Reactions and Selfie Stickers

Publication Date: January 15, 2025
Source: Indian Express

WhatsApp is rolling out its first update of 2025, featuring new functionalities like double tap reactions, creating stickers from selfies, and sharing sticker packs.

  • Users can choose from 30 backgrounds, effects, and filters when using the built-in camera.
  • A new 'Create sticker' button allows users to turn selfies into stickers easily.
  • Sticker packs can now be shared directly within chat, enhancing user interaction.
  • Double tap reaction functionality speeds up message responses compared to the previous method.
  • Future updates may introduce a new 'AIs' tab for creating custom AI chatbots and accessing AI services.
The update allows users to react to messages more quickly with a simple double-tap.

This update signifies WhatsApp's commitment to enhancing user experience and integrating new technologies.

title: Alembic Pharmaceuticals receives USFDA approval for Brexpiprazole Tablets - Business Standard
summary:
Alembic Pharmaceuticals Receives USFDA Approval for Brexpiprazole Tablets

Last Updated: Jan 15 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Alembic Pharmaceuticals announced that it has received Final Approval from the US FDA for its ANDA for Brexpiprazole Tablets, used in the treatment of major depressive disorder and schizophrenia.

  • Alembic received approval for multiple strengths of Brexpiprazole Tablets (0.25 mg to 4 mg).
  • The new drug is therapeutically equivalent to Otsuka's Rexulti Tablets.
  • The estimated market size for Brexpiprazole is $2.0 billion for the year ending September 2024.
  • Alembic has a total of 220 ANDA approvals from the USFDA, comprising 194 final and 26 tentative approvals.
“Brexpiprazole is an atypical antipsychotic used as an adjunctive therapy to antidepressants for MDD in adults.”

This approval enhances Alembic's portfolio in the psychiatric treatment space and could significantly impact market dynamics.
newTitle: Alembic Pharmaceuticals Receives USFDA Approval for Brexpiprazole Tablets

title: OnePlus 13R vs iQOO Neo 9 Pro: Which is the best flagship killer right now? | Mint - Mint
January Patch Tuesday resolves 3 Hyper-V zero-days - TechTarget
summary:
January Patch Tuesday resolves 3 Hyper-V zero-days

Date: January 14, 2025
Source: TechTarget

This January, Microsoft addressed one of the highest numbers of vulnerabilities in recent memory, including three critical zero-day exploits affecting Hyper-V.

  • 159 unique CVEs corrected, with 10 rated critical.
  • Majority of vulnerabilities affected Windows OS, with eight critical ones.
  • Three Hyper-V zero-days identified as CVE-2025-21333, CVE-2025-21334, and CVE-2025-21335, all with a 7.8 CVSS score.
  • These vulnerabilities allow attackers to gain system-level privileges without user interaction.
  • Other notable security updates include CVE-2025-21298 and CVE-2025-21311, both with a CVSS score of 9.8.
"Microsoft confirmed these as exploits in the wild... treat them as critical and give them a higher priority." - Chris Goettl

The patching of these vulnerabilities is crucial for organizations using Hyper-V, as they do not have alternative mitigations.
newTitle: January Patch Tuesday resolves 3 Hyper-V zero-days

title: OpenAI rolls out assistant-like feature ‘Tasks’ to take on Alexa, Siri - The Hindu
summary:
OpenAI Unveils 'Tasks' Feature for ChatGPT to Compete with Alexa and Siri

Published: January 15, 2025 09:44 am IST | Source: The Hindu

OpenAI has introduced a new beta feature called Tasks to ChatGPT, marking its entry into the virtual assistant market where it will compete with established services like Amazon's Alexa and Apple's Siri.

  • Tasks allows users to request future actions like reminders and updates.
  • ChatGPT may suggest tasks based on user interactions, which can be accepted or declined.
  • The feature aims to keep ChatGPT competitive following the rise of AI in personal assistance.
  • Amazon and Apple are also enhancing their AI capabilities in response to the growing trend.
“The revamped version of Alexa—which will take actions for users without prompting—is slated to be released in the 'coming months',” said Amazon CEO Andy Jassy.

The rollout of Tasks will begin with Plus, Team, and Pro users, starting with the web platform.
newTitle: OpenAI Unveils 'Tasks' Feature for ChatGPT to Compete with Alexa and Siri

title: Garena Free Fire MAX Redeem Codes for January 15: How to avail free in-game rewards - India TV News
summary:

Date: January 15, 2025 | Source: India TV News

Garena, a popular gaming company, has released daily redeem codes for the popular battle royale game, Free Fire MAX, allowing players to claim various in-game items for free.

Key Points:

  • Redeem codes include emotes, weapon skins, and more, enhancing the gameplay experience.
  • Current codes valid for January 15, including: FFPSTXV5FRDM for Pushpa Emote, FXK2NDY5QSMX for Yellow Poker MP40, and several others.
  • Players must act quickly as codes are time-sensitive and region-specific.

How to Redeem Free Fire MAX codes:

  1. Visit the Free Fire MAX rewards redemption website: reward.ff.garena.com.
  2. Log in using your Free Fire MAX account credentials.
  3. Click on the redeem banner and enter the code in the provided field.
If successful, your rewards will be credited to your account within 24 hours.

Important points to note about the game:

  • Free Fire MAX is currently available in India; Free Fire remains banned.
  • Codes are region-specific—expired or incorrect codes may show an error message.
  • Players should redeem as quickly as possible due to time-sensitivity.

Conclusion: Use valid codes from official sources to ensure rewards and avoid errors.

WhatsApp Introduces New Selfie Stickers and Camera Effects

Date: January 15, 2025 Source: Moneycontrol

WhatsApp has kicked off 2025 by introducing a series of updates designed to enhance chat interactions. These updates include fun camera effects and the ability to create selfie stickers.

title: OpenAI rolls out assistant-like feature 'Tasks' to take on Alexa, Siri - Deccan Herald
summary:
OpenAI Rolls Out Assistant-Like Feature 'Tasks' to Take on Alexa, Siri

Published: 15 January 2025, IST

Generative artificial intelligence leader OpenAI is rolling out a new beta feature called Tasks to ChatGPT, introducing functionalities that compete with virtual assistants like Apple’s Siri and Amazon’s Alexa.

  • Tasks allows users to set future reminders, manage one-time requests, and schedule recurring tasks.
  • ChatGPT can suggest tasks based on user interactions, which users can choose to accept or decline.
  • This feature comes amid increased competition, prompting Amazon to refresh Alexa with generative AI capabilities.
  • Apple has also incorporated AI features into Siri, enhancing its functionality with the help of OpenAI's technology.
  • The beta version will be available to Plus, Team, and Pro users globally via the web platform within a few days.
“With Tasks, users can efficiently manage their schedule and stay updated on important events,” said an OpenAI spokesperson.

This rollout signifies an important step for OpenAI as it expands its offerings in the competitive landscape of virtual assistants, enhancing user engagement and AI capabilities.
newTitle: OpenAI Introduces 'Tasks' Feature to Compete with Alexa and Siri

MGNREGS allocations could be increased for FY26 | Mint - Mint
summary:
Potential Increase in MGNREGS Budget Allocations for FY26

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Mint

The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Scheme (MGNREGS), a crucial employment lifeline for the rural poor in India, may see increased budget allocations for FY26, according to sources familiar with the matter.

  • MGNREGS allocations are expected to remain flat for FY25 due to an improvement in the rural economy this year.
  • Moderate increases are anticipated for FY26 in comparison to the previous fiscal year.
  • The scheme is vital for providing employment to millions of impoverished Indians.

This anticipated increase highlights the government's commitment to supporting rural employment amid changing economic conditions.
newTitle: Potential Increase in MGNREGS Budget Allocations for FY26
